statements: UPDATE DriverPerformance SET driver_name='John Doe', delivery_zone='Zone A', delivery_completed=true, completion_time='2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE driver_id=1;
UPDATE DriverPerformance SET delivery_completed=false, completion_time='2022-05-16 08:45:00', driver_name='Jane Smith', delivery_zone='Zone B' WHERE driver_id=2;
UPDATE DriverPerformance SET completion_time = '2023-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE driver_id = 101 AND delivery_completed = TRUE;
UPDATE DriverPerformance SET driver_name = 'Alice', delivery_zone = 'Zone A', completion_time = '2023-01-02 10:00:00' WHERE driver_id = 102;
UPDATE driver_performance SET total_miles_driven = 1500.75, completed_deliveries = 50 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE delivery_completion SET delivery_status = 'Completed' WHERE driver_id = 101 AND delivery_id = 201;
UPDATE driver_performance SET completed_deliveries = 50, total_miles_driven = 500.25 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE delivery_completion SET delivery_status = 'Completed' WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE DriverPerformance SET total_deliveries = total_deliveries + 1, avg_delivery_time = 45.5 WHERE driver_id = 12345;
UPDATE DeliveryRates SET delivery_rating = 4.5, delivery_status = 'completed', delivery_time = '2022-09-01 10:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 54321 AND delivery_id = 98765;
UPDATE DriverPerformance SET total_deliveries = total_deliveries + 1, avg_delivery_time = 15.5 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE DeliveryMetrics SET delivery_distance = 10.25, delivery_cost = 30.75 WHERE driver_id = 456 AND delivery_id = 789;
UPDATE Drivers SET total_deliveries = 50, completed_deliveries = 40 WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE Deliveries SET delivery_status = 'Completed', delivery_date = '2022-10-21' WHERE delivery_id = 1001;
UPDATE Drivers SET total_deliveries = total_deliveries + 1, completed_deliveries = completed_deliveries + 1 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE Deliveries SET delivery_status = 'Completed', delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE driver_id = 102 AND delivery_id = 201;
UPDATE driver_performance SET delivery_completion_rate = 0.85 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE driver_stats SET total_deliveries = 100, total_miles_driven = 500.75, average_completion_time = '2:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 456;
UPDATE driver_performance SET delivery_completion_rate = 0.95 WHERE driver_id = 123
UPDATE delivery_data SET delivery_status = 'Completed', delivery_time = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 456
